Summary: It dissappears and reappears i think they can go invisible
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Atlantic City
There were no other sightings in Atlantic City on or around February 2nd 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the car with the biggest skeptic in the world, and he starts yelling ""You see thats what im talking about. I looked up to the sky and saw about 6 fireballs in formation of a boomerang that dissappeared and reappeared. in all there were 7 witnesses. I was in so much shock that i didnt remember that my camera was in the car! Im not sure that the date i wrote down was corrected but i am positive that it was a UFO!I know that about a month before this sighting he had seen the same thing but it was a lime glowing light. We live right by the bay and thats where the sightings have happened. I find myself searching the skies everyday since.I lost sight of it when it completely dissapeared. Weirdest thing was that we liv next to a airbase and approx. 10 min after the sighting we heard that the jet planes were set out. 25 min later we saw a object flying really high flying quickly in the dark sky then it stopped for a split second then it zoomed by so fast.
